context.p: CM-Portal allows managing Users/Admins of a given list of product numbers.
NOTE: This feature is available only to Admins.

info.p: From the side Menu, click the Products, then Update link.

ul.li: Product Numbers: Comma separated list of the product numbers to be updated. This field is required.
Design Responsible Org:Enter New Org Unit Short Name in Ericsson employees profile (shown in People Finder).

Manage Admins:By default signums and access control groups are added/removed from the Products 'Users' list. To manage Products 'Admins', click the Manage Admins button. All actions will be performed on the 'Admins' list instead.
Action to be performed: Choose between 'Add, or 'Remove' Signums and ACGs to the list of product numbers.
Signums: Choose Signum(s) to update from the dropdown menu. Note:if the signum required cannot be found on the dropdown menu: type the signum then press Enter .
Access Control Groups Names: Comma separated list of the Access Control Groups Names to be assigned/removed.

info.p: Click the Update Products button, the CM-Portal will execute the required operations on Mimer and a log will be saved in the CM-Portal. The user will be redirected to the log view page to see the details of the operations performed on Mimer.
